exceptions.unknown-error: An error occurs, please try a few more moments ...
exceptions.too-many-requests: Too much request, try again later

onboarding.title: Make quality questions with
onboarding.description: Arrange the questions easily based on the cognitive level of students, from {remember} to {analyze} and {create}. Make learning more effective and structured!

auth.account-register-success-desc-1: Have a good study! It's time to explore

forgot-password.reset-password-description: Enter the email that you have registered so that we can help reset your password.
forgot-password.send-verification-email-description: We will send a verification link to your email to reset the password.
forgot-password.check-email: Please check your email and open the verification link to continue.
forgot-password.not-received-email: Not receiving email? Try again in {time}
forgot-password.new-password-tips: Be sure to use a password that is easy to remember
forgot-password.continue-to-apps: You can proceed to the application or return to the initial page, according to your needs.

card.material-description: Learn material based on cognitive levels
card.examples-description: Explore Examples of questions for mathematics, Pancasila, Indonesian, and MIPA subjects at the elementary school level

task.title: Task
task.task-description: The task is designed to measure your understanding deeper. Admin will judge your work and provide feedback as a learning guide.
task.task-no-works: Looks like you haven't collected assignments. Come on, start working on your first task and get an assessment and feedback from the instructor!

quiz.title: Quiz
quiz.quiz-description: Do an interactive quiz for each subject in each class. Consists of 10 questions per subject with a time limit of 30 seconds per question. Challenge yourself and increase understanding quickly and fun.
quiz.quiz-no-works: Haven't had time to work on a quiz? Come on, from now on and prove how far you have learned in the menu
